name: SFSafariViewController.Configuration
desc: A configuration object that defines how a Safari view controller should be initialized.

items.name: var entersReaderIfAvailable: Bool
items.desc: A value that specifies whether Safari should enter Reader mode, if it is available.

items.name: var eventAttribution: UIEventAttribution?
items.desc: An object you use to send tap event attribution data to the browser for Private Click Measurement.
